markdownRemark.html:
This is a collection of homebrew (as in beer) stuff I've made or find useful.

Things I've Made

Hop Aging Calculator

This is an online tool that brewers can use to adjust their hop dosing so that they can hit their target IBUs.

Brewtarget

My fork of Brewtarget that adds:

  • automatically built binaries for Ubuntu & Arch Linux
  • automatically built Docker Guaci Container so you can run it in a browser

DIY single vessel brewer

See my post on Aussie Home Brewer detailing my Braumiester clone.

Things I find useful

Westgate Brewers homebrew club.

Brewer's friend ABV calculator and Brix calculator.
